title: ITV1 and STV to broadcast  2023 Community Shield  live ITV1 and STV to broadcast  2023 Community Shield  live
body_text:
The 2023 FA Community Shield will air live on ITV1 and ITVX, STV and STV Player, on Sunday, August 6.
Manchester City, who took home both the Premier League and FA Cup in 2022/23 as part of their famous treble with the Champions League title, will take on league runners-up Arsenal at Wembley.
The traditional curtain-raiser, which kicks off at 5.30pm, returns to the home of English football for its 100th anniversary after last year’s match was played at Leicester due to a clash with the UEFA Women’s EURO Final.
